name: Goofy Monsters - Sokoban Land
storyline: These goofy monsters are lost around the world and we need your help to find them. But this is not an easy task, you will need to think a lot to solve all the puzzles before putting them to sleep..
summary: It’s a puzzle Sokoban game where the player must use his finger to push monsters to the right directions, use scenery elements in his favor and use reasoning to be able to fit little creatures in their proper places and complete the levels.
